project.title: Mini Portofolio
project.tagline: Responsive personal portfolio website in lite version
project.about: Responsive, clean, and beautiful portfolio website in lite version.
features: Responsive built with HTML, CSS/SCSS, and JavaScript
Includes a light and dark mode
Lazy load images to increase page load speed
Compatible with all mobile devices and beautiful user interface
project.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean.
